code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button,TextField}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HWSets=_ref=>{let{hwName}=_ref;const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState(0);const handleCheckIn=()=>alert(`${quantity} units checked in.`);const handleCheckOut=()=>alert(`${quantity} units checked out.`);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:hwName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Quantity",type:"number",variant:"outlined",value:quantity,onChange:e=>setQuantity(e.target.value),size:"small",style:{marginRight:'10px',width:'80px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outlined",color:"secondary",onClick:handleCheckOut,style:{marginRight:'5px',borderColor:'black',color:'black'},children:"Check Out"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outlined",color:"primary",onClick:handleCheckIn,style:{borderColor:'black',color:'black'},children:"Check In"})]});};export default HWSets;
